|brand = TP-LINK |model = TGR1900 |submodelappend = yes |submodel = BLU |revision = (Google OnHub) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = October 10, 2015 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/TP-LINK_TGR1900_(Google_OnHub) |wlclass = AC1750 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TE7TGR1900 |icid = 8853A-TGR1900 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ8064; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARMv7-A |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 1.4 GHz <!-- doc? --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;N25Q064A; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Micron;MTFC4GACAAAM-1MWT; |flash2size = 4 GiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K256M16HA-125:E; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8337;QCA8337-AL3C, E5R650.KE, 1452, TAIWAN; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = Coreboot;;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = no
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 4.0, ZigBee, Speaker 3W |addchip = 2.4GHz WLAN Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SKY2623L;;3; ,,, 2.4GHz 256QAM LNA Module;Skyworks;SKY65971-11;;3; ,,, 5GHz WLAN Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SKY85405;;3; ,,, 5GHz 802.11ac LNA Module;Skyworks;SKY65981-11;;3; ,,, 5GHz DPDT switch;Skyworks;SKY13438;;3; ,,, 2.4GHz Bluetooth Radio Chip;Atheros;AR3012-BL3D;;1; ,,, SoC Network Co-Processor for ZigBee;Silicon Labs;EM3581;;1; ,,, 2.4GHz ZigBee/Smart Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY66109-1;;1; ,,, Programmable 9-output LED Driver;National Semiconductor;LP5523;;1; ,,, Trusted Platform Module;Infineon;SLB9615;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/12/2015 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = 200 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B013ALA9LA |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9880;QCA9880-BR4A, FNRB480.K6, 1518, TAIWAN; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 1300 |rad1n = 450 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9880;QCA9880-BR4A, FNRB480.K6, 1518, TAIWAN; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
|rad3chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9882;QCA9882-BR4A, FNPT344.K4, 1514, TAIWAN; |rad3oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad3_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad3txchains = 1 |rad3rxchains = 1 |rad3sstreams = 1 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam3 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad3ac = <!-- 433, 867, 1300, 1733, Maximum throughput rated at --> |nqam3 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad3n = <!-- 150, 300, 450, 600, Maximum throughput rated at --> |rad3g = <!-- 54, 108, Maximum throughput rated at --> |rad3b = <!-- 11, Maximum throughput rated at --> |rad3a = <!-- 54, Maximum throughput rated at --> |rad3freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "Model: TGR1900(BLU)(US) Ver:1.0", "1520" (05/2015), :"02002" and "CA-F121" is silkscreened on the board. {{FCC ST|02/05/2016|imdexme.}}
==Links of Interest== :[https://on.google.com/hub/ Product page] ('''[[Google OnHub]]''' Router) :[http://www.tp-link.us/products/details/cat-9_TGR1900.html Product page] ([[TP-LINK TGR1900 (Google OnHub)|TP-LINK TGR1900]] OnHub Router)
===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32823-google-tp-link-onhub-router-reviewed ''Google/TP-LINK OnHub Router Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :*'''CPU''': [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8064 @1.4GHz :*'''Flash''': 4GB + 8MB, '''RAM''': 1GB (DDR3) :*'''Switch''': [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA8337 (GbE) :*'''2.4GHz Radio''': [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9880 (3x3 802.11abgn) ::- ''[[Skyworks]]'' SE2623L 2.4GHz power amp (x3) ::- ''[[Skyworks]]'' unidentified DPDT switch ("S81") (x3) ::- ''[[Skyworks]]'' SKY65971-11 2.4GHz 256QAM LNA (x3) :*'''5GHz Radio''': [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9880 (3x3 802.11an/ac) ::- ''[[Skyworks]]'' SKY85405 5GHz Power amp (x3) ::- ''[[Skyworks]]'' SKY13438 6GHz DPDT switch (x3) ::- ''[[Skyworks]]'' SKY65981-11 5GHz 802.11ac LNA (x3) :*'''Monitor''': [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9882 (1x1 802.11abgn/ac) :*'''Bluetooth''': [[Atheros]] AR3012 Bluetooth 4.0 SoC :*'''ZigBee''': ''Silicon Labs'' EM3581 ZigBee/Thread SoC ::- ''[[Skyworks]]'' SKY66109-11 2.4GHz Front End Module
===Teardown=== *[https://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/OnHub+Teardown/48129 ''Teardown Google OnHub'' on '''iFixit'''] :*'''CPU''': [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8064 @1.4GHz ::Dual-core (2x Krait 300) :*'''Flash''': 8MB (SPI) + 4GB (eMMC) ::''Micron'' [https://www.micron.com/~/media/documents/products/technical-note/nor-flash/tn1224_spi_marking.pdf N25Q064A] (64Mb SPI flash) ::''Micron'' [http://www.micron.com/parts/nand-flash/managed-nand/mtfc4gacaaam-1m-wt MTFC4GACAAAM] (4GB NAND flash) ::chip marked "M, 4ZA28JWA57, 7PYG" (4GB eMMC NAND) :*'''RAM''': 1GB - 2x ''Micron'' [http://www.micron.com/parts/dram/ddr3-sdram/mt41k256m16ha-125 MT41K256M16HA] 512MB (256Mbx16) ::chip marked "M, 5DE77D9PXV, PGGL" (4Gb DDR3L SDRAM) :*'''WLAN''': 2x [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9880 (3T3R 802.11abgn/ac) ::Congestion-sensing radio: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9882 (1x1) ::''[[Skyworks]]'' SKY2623L - 2.4GHz WLAN Power amplifier ::''[[Skyworks]]'' SKY85405 - 5GHz WLAN Power amplifier :*'''Antenna''': Dual band 2.4GHz and 5GHz 12-antenna array ::6x 2.4GHz antennas (marked J211, J212, J221, J222, J231, J232) ::6x 5GHz antennas (marked J511, J512, J521, J522, J531, J532) ::1x congestion-sensing antenna (JS1) :*'''Bluetooth''': [[Atheros]] AR3012-BL3D Bluetooth 4.0 SoC + antenna (JBT1) ::''Infineon'' SLB9615 - Trusted Platform Module :*'''ZigBee''': ''Silicon Labs'' EM3581 SoC Network Co-Processor + ant. (JZB1) ::''[[Skyworks]]'' SKY66109 - 2.4GHz ZigBee/Smart Energy front-end module :*'''Switch''': [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA8337 (1x WAN, 1x LAN) :*'''USB''': 1x USB 3.0 port + Bluetooth 4.0 :*'''LED''': ''National Semiconductor'' LP5523 Programmable 9-output LED driver ::Ambient light sensor, Speaker 3W
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/tp-link/tp-link_onhub_tgr1900 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/inbox/toh/google/onhub_tp-link_tgr1900 |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/t/onhub-tp-link-tgr1900-future-support/17899 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ipq806x |subtarget = chromium |arch = arm_cortex-a15_neon-vfpv4 |support_started_version = 23.05.0 |current_supported_version = 23.05.3 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = radio2 is for monitoring, not regular use }} Please insert instructions here
